txt.en: You have found an ornate chest-piece from a set of heavy armour, old but of superlative craftsmanship and raked with claw-marks, lying seemingly unattended. You may wish to find out more about it.\n\nPerhaps a dwarf in the Chamber of the Cross-roads will know more.
'An ornate chest-piece, you say? Surrounded by bats... that is interesting.'
'Haven't any idea. Your pardon, but I've work to do.'
'My apologies, but this is not within my area of expertise. Perhaps Gamli, over in the bunk area, would be interested.'
You found an ornate chest-piece from a set of heavy armour, old but of superlative craftsmanship and raked with claw-marks, lying seemingly unattended. You may wish to find out more about it.
'I've no time to be looking at discarded armour! Ask someone else.'
Talk to Rambi at the Chamber of the Cross-roads
You may wish to ask someone in the Chamber of the Cross-roads about the armour you found.
Ask someone in the Gate Stores about the armour
